system.description: At 15th level, if you can get to them in time, there’s virtually nobody you can’t save. You learn the spare the dying cantrip. Additionally, once per long rest, you may cast revivify without material components. If you have already used this feature, you may use it again a number of times equal to half your proficiency bonus, but you require one use of a healer’s kit to do so (it is consumed in the process).
